items.title: Hindalco subsidiary Novelis working to mitigate tariff headwinds, expects resilient demand for aluminium
items.description: Novelis added that it is looking to accelerate cost reduction steps, which can drive higher cost savings in FY26, and over $300 million by end of FY28.

items.title: Centre plans divestments in LIC, public sector banks beyond SEBI's requirements: Report
items.description: The move won’t affect government’s majority ownership and management control, the report said

items.title: Lupin launches Glucagon injection, targets $122 million annual market in US for low blood sugar
items.description: The drug category has an estimated annual sale of $122 million in the US. Shares of Lupin were marginally higher in the session, sharply rising after the announcement was made public.

items.title: Treasury gains propel SBI profit in Q1 FY26
items.description: The bank’s valuation remains the main attraction

items.title: Air India Express announces 'freedom sale' with fares from Rs 1,279
items.description: In a release, the airline said bookings are open until August 15 for travel from August 19, 2024, to March 31, 2026

items.title: Bluestone Jewellery and Lifestyle IPO: Will it shine on the bourses?
items.description: The company is not profitable at the moment and may continue to make losses in the near term

items.title: Potholes on the path, but Tata’s long drive is not over
items.description: While the management remains confident about the business, declining margin remains a concern

items.title: Shreeji Shipping sets price band of Rs 240-252 a share for IPO
items.description: The anchor bidding will start on August 18 and the issue will close on August 21.
